revised_title: Johannes Martin Bijvoet: A Pioneering Crystallographer and Thermodynamicist
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and scientific achievements of Johannes Martin Bijvoet, a prominent Dutch chemist and crystallographer. Bijvoet made significant contributions to the fields of crystallography and thermodynamics, including the determination of the crystal structures of lithium hydride and sodium chlorate. His passion for understanding the fundamentals of science and his dedication to his work inspired many colleagues and students throughout his career.
